Support Scope

Support for billing and subscription management-related issues as well as technical break-fix issues is available at all support levels. Advisory and account management services are available at the Premier support levels.

Products for Service include:

  • Microsoft Azure services released to General Availability (GA).
  • Microsoft Azure Public Preview services.
  • Non-Microsoft technologies, when provided as part of an Azure product feature, such as the Azure SDK and sample code for Python.

Severity and Responsiveness

Initial Response Time is the period from when you submit your support request to when a Support Engineer contacts you and starts working on your support request. The Initial Response Time varies with both the support plan and the Business Impact of the request (also known as Severity).

Customer Status Initial Response Time Expected Customer Response
Severity A2

Critical business impact

Customer’s business has significant loss or degradation of services, and requires immediate attention

Developer: N/A1

Standard: < 1 hour

Premier < 1 hour

24 × 7 access

When you select Severity A you confirm that the issue has critical business impact, with severe loss and degradation of services.The issue demands an immediate response, and you commit to continuous, 24x7 operation, every day with the support team until resolution, otherwise, support team may at its discretion decrease the Severity to level B.

You also ensure that support team has your accurate contact information.
Severity B2

Moderate business impact

Customer’s business has moderate loss or degradation of services but work can reasonably continue in an impaired manner.

Developer: < 4 hours3

Standard: < 4 hours3

Premier < 2 hours3

Business hours access

When you select Severity B you confirm that the issue has moderate impact to your business with loss and degradation of services, but workarounds enable reasonable, albeit temporary, business continuity. The issue demands an urgent response every day with the support team until resolution, otherwise, support team may at its discretion decrease the severity to level C.

You also ensure that support team has your accurate contact information.
Severity C

Minimum business impact

Customer’s business is functioning with minor impediments of services.

Developer: < 8 hours3

Standard: < 8 hours3

Premier < 4 hours3

Business hours access

When you select Severity C you confirm that the issue has minimum impact to your business with minor impediment of service. For Severity C, support team will contact you only during business hours.

You also ensure that support team has your accurate contact information.

1For technical support, maximum severity for Developer support is Severity B and not applicable to Severity A.

2 Severity level may be decreased if the customer fails to provide sufficient resources or respond timely to allow support engineers to continue to address the issue.

3 Response times during business hours.

Business hours

  • Technical Support:
    • Severity A (crisis): 24 x 7.
    • The severity category is Level B/C:
      • Technical support of IaaS: 9:00~24:00 (all year round).
      • Developer technical support: 9:00~24:00 (except weekends, public holidays).
      • Premier advanced support: 9:00~18:00 (except weekends, public holidays).
  • Business support (billing, subscription, quota, product inquiry, pre-sales support, ICP filing): 9:00~18:00 (excluding public holidays, weekends).

Note: The time above is Beijing time (UTC + 8)
